column4: has anyone used macchanger before? is eth1 always the default internet device?
I was Guest31636 but changed my name to this
it's not.and you can change MAC simply with ifconfig
also you might need a newer fglrx https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI#Manually_installing_Catalyst_12.6
this is a support channel, not an advocacy channel. please respect that
